snippet: Dianna Duran, the former New Mexico secretary of state, was booked into jail to serve a 30-day sentence for using election money to fuel a gambling spree.
abstract: Former New Mexico Secretary of State Dianna Duran surrenders to authorities and is booked into jail and will serve 30-day sentence for using election account money for gambling.
lead_paragraph: Dianna Duran, the former New Mexico secretary of state, was booked into jail to serve a 30-day sentence for using election money to fuel a gambling spree.

headline.main: New Mexico: Former Top Official Begins Jail Sentence
headline.print_headline: New Mexico: Former Top Official Begins Jail Sentence
